items.text: flicks it from off-stump to wide long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.preText: Bangladesh need a wicket, and they've turned to The Fizz
items.text: back of a length on leg stump, he moved slightly across to tuck it to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: given room outside off, back of a length. He slashes it to the man on the cover fence. Opportunity missed perhaps, that was begging to be put away for a boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williams, 1 run

items.text: over the top got a lot of height on it, but off the toe-end. Mid-on and mid-off were both in the circle, so though he miscued it, it landed safely beyond them and rolled into the fence
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: worked away but to the midwicket fielder inside the circle
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: offcutter on the stumps, Taylor shows textbook forward defence, though he had to adjust late
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: pushed to long-off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.preText: Chayon: "The spin department of BDESH seems very inexperienced and ineffective without Sakib. Apu & Miraz have only taken 20 wickets collectively prior to this match in ODIs. Arafat Sunny, with an average of 25, is much more effective than these two in ODIs. "
items.text: tossed up and dismissed fullish on the stumps, and he gets down on one knee to swat it to the midwicket fence
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: flatter on the stumps, he comes down the track but can only pat it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Taylor, no run

items.text: flat on the stumps, whipped to long-on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: given some more air, full on the stumps, clipped to short midwicket
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, no run

items.text: half-volley down leg, and that should have been put away. He could only hit it straight to short fine leg
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, no run

items.text: full on off, and driven straight to cover
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, no run

items.preText:
Tasmeem: "Spinners are not bowling well. Mashrafe needs another 12 overs from them. Worrying signs."

jamal: "What is it with BD fans always bringing up players of the past to replace a current, younger player? Arafat Sunny is 32 and last had a suspect bowling action. Hear this similar rhetoric with BD fans wanting Ashraful back. No. Keep them in the past, let's move on with some younger players. "
items.text: back of a length on off, punched back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: short ball outside off, delicately done by Taylor. He waited for it and ran it down to third man off an open bat face, at shoulder height
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, squirted to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williams, no run

items.preText: Akashdeep Nain: "Taylor is such a good player, Zimbabwe could have build a nice team around him. It's a pity because of board conflicts there was never a stable Zimbabwian side."
items.text: finally gets hold of one short ball, that sat up begging to be hit. He picked it early, swivelled and pulled, made good connection to send it to the midwicket fence
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williams, FOUR runs

items.text: full on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williams, no run

items.text: short ball again, and he pulls again, but this time more square. The man at deep square leg collects
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williams, 1 run

items.text: flighted on the stumps, turned to deep square leg
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, 1 run

items.text: had some room outside off there, but couldn't connected with the intended slap. gets the under-edge back to the bowler
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Taylor, no run

items.text: full on the stumps, driven down to long-off
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on the stumps, he tries to drive inside out, but straight to cover
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, no run

items.text: flicked, but still can't find the gap. straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, no run

items.text: fuller and more air, but on leg stump, he turns it round the corner
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, 1 run
